title: Mothers Respecting Their Sons
itunes:author: Guest: Rhonda Stoppe
itunes:summary:
Even from a young age, boys want to be respected. As a mom, you have a unique and wonderful opportunity to show him a healthy version of what that looks like. But what if you feel like you've missed some opportunities? John and Danny offer hope to parents who feel like they didn't teach their sons healthy respect. Featuring Rhonda Stoppe.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Rhonda Stoppe's book "Moms Raising Sons to be Men" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-11-16?refcd=1311602

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/mothers-respecting-their-sons//#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
